data.text: Tie: Nyansa refrɛ.
Ɔkwan no so, sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ,
apon a ɛkɔ kuropɔn no mu no ho,
“Ao, mo nnipa na meteɛ mu refrɛ;
Mo a moyɛ ntetekwaa, momma mo ani ntew;
Muntie, na mewɔ nsɛm pa bi ka kyerɛ mo;
Mʼano ka nea ɛyɛ nokware,
Mʼanom nsɛm nyinaa yɛ pɛ;
Ne nyinaa mu da hɔ ma nea ɔwɔ nhumu;
Mompo dwetɛ na momfa mʼakwankyerɛ,
Efisɛ nimdeɛ som bo sen bota,
“Me, nyansa, mene anitew na ɛte;
Sɛ wosuro Awurade ɛne sɛ wokyi bɔne;
Afotu ne atemmu pa wɔ me;
Me so na ahemfo nam di ade
Mmapɔmma de me bu ɔman
Medɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ me,
Ahonyade ne anuonyam wɔ me nkyɛn,
Mʼaba ye sen sikakɔkɔɔ ankasa;
Trenee akwan so na menam,
mede ahode ma wɔn a wɔdɔ me
“Awurade bɔɔ me sɛ nʼabɔde mu abakan
oyii me sii hɔ fi tete,
Wɔwoo me ansa na wɔrebɔ po kakraka no,
ansa na wɔde mmepɔw resisi hɔ;
ansa na ɔbɔɔ asase ne ne mfuw
Mewɔ hɔ ansa na wɔbɔɔ ɔsoro,
bere a ɔbɔɔ omununkum wɔ soro
bere a otwaa ɔhye maa po
na meyɛ odwumfo a mete ne nkyɛn.
na mʼani gye wɔ ne wiase nyinaa mu
“Enti me mma, muntie me;
Muntie mʼakwankyerɛ na munhu nyansa;
Nhyira ne onipa a otie me,
Na obiara a ohu me no nya nkwa,
Na nea wanhwehwɛ me no haw ne ho
